contents:
樓主的連結沒有提過制裁中資銀行


新闻标题:U.S. House passes bill to sanction Chinese banks over Hong Kong
翻译:美众议院通过法案制裁在港中资银行

新闻摘要:The U.S. House of Representatives passed legislation on Wednesday that would penalize banks doing business with Chinese officials who implement a national security law
翻译:美众议院星期三通过决议,对银行进行制裁,如果该银行同实施国安法的中国官员有业务关联.
